question: The Indian Institute of Skills, Mumbai has been established in partnership with which company?
explanation:
In 2018, the Union Cabinet decided to set up Indian Institute of Skills (IISs) at three locations, namely, Maharashtra (Mumbai), Gujarat (Ahmedabad) and Uttar Pradesh (Kanpur) in Public Private Partnership (PPP).
Tata Trust has been selected as the Private partner to establish IIS in Mumbai and Ahmadabad. Recently, the Union Minister for Skill Development and Entrepreneurship Mahendra Nath Pandey inaugurated the first batch of Indian Institute of Skills in Mumbai.
